1.content:
"see you later " - jJon

"yeah later" - Ryan

Ryan worked for a supermarket chain that had a alley going down the side leading to the main road, some of it was lit, but the end was real dark and was scary to go through. Ryan had done this walk for a few years, but this night was going to be real different.

Ryan was half way, when a dart hit him in the back, he pulled it out but it empty, he went back to see who it was but they had gone. he carried on home and went to bed. The morning came and Ryan rubbed his tried eyes, his feet were cold, but when he pulled them in there was no room for them. He sat and saw that he had grown taller, shocked he stood up and banged his head on the ceiling. He was about 5,6 when he went to bed and , he must have been a least a foot taller. Trying to understand what had happened, he saw that he had grown in other parts, He was ripped, his whole body was huge, bicep 25", 8 pack abs, thick legs and of course is manhood had got a major upgrade. He was 6x5 the night before but now was getting aroused and it just kept getting bigger and bigger, at full mast 10x7 - he gave it a go and in no time at all he was cumming hard with great force and he had so much he was stunned.

Even though he loved his new self, his mind did wounder as to how much his life was gonna change, for example he was taller than his room, bed way too small, clothes, work etc...
Just then the doorbell rang, shaun lived at the top of a three story house - no clothes he grabbed his sheet and headed downstairs which was harder because of is feet being bigger than the stairs and the muscle weight he had put on, he made it to the door to find ....

12.content:
The door opened and a man with a few packages said " Mr R Smith" and i replied, he gave me the device which in my hands looked like a toy. I couldn't use the pen so i just used a fingerprint, he handed them over and said bye, i shut the door and went to the living room with them, it was hard getting around the doors making sure not to break anything. i opened the biggest one first it had a note reading, " Dear Mr Smith, i am writing to you to come the address below so that i can explain what has happened and see where we go from there" - Director B.
Clearly confused by the note, Ryan decided that he was hungry so he got all the food out of the fridge and cooked a storm as carefully as possible, the pans where small, having to no break the cooker with his power. After he finished the meal which would have feed a medium family, he had to get something to wear out to the director, as his brother was 6,1 he tried some jogging bottoms and a t- shirt that was tight but covered.

He made is way to the director at night as not to cause any attention, the place was not to far and with his new longer legs it took half the time, it was a warehouse that had as it appeared used for a while, he got to the door and gave it a knock, a man came and he said ...
